text:
```json
{
  "explanation": "Ad impressions are closely related to advertising activities, specifically those aimed at assessing the reach or performance of an advertisement. The most relevant purpose is 'Advertising', which directly involves the process or artefact used to call attention to a product, service, etc. through announcements, notices, or other forms of communication. Concepts like 'Personalised Advertising' or 'Targeted Advertising' involve creating and providing advertisements tailored to individuals, which also fit within the scope of ad impressions. However, these concepts imply an additional layer of personalisation, whereas general advertising inherently includes ad impressions.",
  "results": [26, 66, 94],
  "unmatchedConcepts": []
}
```
